price: 45. Kaadu keenik naharat suge mari farmoytit dirabboyseeh, keenik naharat suge marah neceemik (qandeey, maaluuy qumri kinnuk) Makki mari tabanhaytoh afá magufinna, eddeluk Yi- farmoytit dirabboyseenih, tokkel keenit abe assacokkii kee digaalá mannak tencch!
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَمَا بَلَغُواْ مِعۡشَارَ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُواْ رُسُلِيۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba alladhīna min qablihim wamā balaghū miʿ'shāra mā ātaynāhum fakadhabū rusulī fakayfa kāna nakīri
